root: ^It's been a while since a newcomer has joined us. Welcome!

c-0: ^ There's no reason to actually put on clothes in your own home, is there?

Divert1: ^You're out in public right now, everyone around can see you

c-0: ^ But this place is my home. If you can see me, you're in my home. I don't go out. I can't go out.
^ I'm trapped in here, the same way that you're trapped in your own mortal flesh, friend.

c-1: ^ It's the land of the free thinkers! Or at least that's how I like to call it.
^That did not help answering my question at all

c-0: ^ This is where your mind goes to think, friend. Everything that happens in here is the construct of your own thoughts.
^Are you saying I'm just hallucinating? Or am I in a trance?
^ Wow, rude. You're I'm not real? I have the right to exist, you know?
^You're not making any sense. Didn't you just say that I'm just imagining this?
^ You're not imagining it. It's a construct of your thoughts.
^Isn't that quite literally the same thing?
